text: Glenn Olof Rönnberg is a Swedish former footballer who played as a left-back, midfielder and a forward, starting his career at AIK Fotboll. He is the brother of fellow footballer Mikael Rönnberg. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish footballers Category:Allsvenskan players Category:AIK Fotboll players Category:People from Stockholm Category:Association football midfielders
title: Glenn Rönnberg
